definition: a type of LCD display used for some portable computers; parallel wires run both vertically and horizontally and pixels are turned on when the wires intersecting at that pixel are both energized; "passive matrix displays are generally inferior to active matrix displays"
subject: noun.artifact

jpn: パッシブマトリクスディスプレイ
tha: จอภาพแบบพาสซีฟเมทริกซ์
